title: Moonlit Majesty
description: She is the mother of the werewolf race and the heroine that her people have waited over a century to be saved by. He is the forbidden fruit that caused her banishment and the key to her return. When the man Zaira blames for the curse hanging over her Pack appears to ask for her help, her first impulse is to rip his throat out, but Addix has been cursed as well. The two must work together to defeat a common enemy, a dangerous journey which brings them closer yet threatens to separate them forever as they struggle to choose between love and duty. The 4th installment in the Moonlit series tells the story of the mysterious White Wolf and how forbidden love created an entire race of shapeshifters.
author: Crystal-Rain Love
